tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Jyoti had treated my ten year old son. There was series of treatment required when we first went to her. She explained us all the details well and went step by step without rushing the treatment. During the process she was really gentle and accommodating.  I really recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I took my 5 year old son for dental filling and my 2 n half year old son for SDF treatment for his front decayed teeth. Doctor Jyoti was sooo sweet and friendly with both the children, explaining exactly what she was doing throughout to both me and him.My older son immediately loved her and started talking alot. As he was a little anxious, we used the nitrogen gas and it worked like magic. He allowed doctor to do the fillings and followed all instructions soo well..even for my younger son, dr Jyoti explained the entire treatment to me so well and is always available on the phone to guide and help. One line which proves I made the right decision to take him to Dr Jyoti was my 5 year old son saying when we were leaving that this dental visit was much much better than he could imagine. Thank you soo much dr Jyoti for easing Jordyns anxiety as well as  mine :). I don't mind travelling all the way from Kharghar for the boys dental visits with you because it's totally worth the effort. Thanks once again. See you in December üòÄ
reply_text: Thank you for such a valuable feedback. We are so glad to hear that Jordyn and Ayden are in better dental health. See you for regular follow up appointments üòÉ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Honestly,amongst doctors I have never come across such a beautiful soul. She has made my son and me so comfortable as my son had 11 cavities which included 5 root canals. As a mother I was very worried to undergo root canals for my son....but the knowledge she had and what she shared with me was immense and convincing. Children will definitely get along very well with Dr.Jyoti. And majorly she cares about the customers money too...she won't go for unnecessary expenses or unwanted treatments.....unlike other doctors in today's market 
She is not just doctor she is FAMILY

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor is very friendly and makes the child comfortable during treatment but I personally did not like the charges being made for follow up check up. I had spent more than  Rs20000 for my daughter's treatment and post the last crown/cap  fitting, she was facing bleeding issue while brushing and hence doctor called for check up. She examined the cap and said everything is fine. Post that I was asked to pay Rs 200 which I found unreasonable as follow up check ups are not charged normally.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor Jyoti, makes child very comfortable. She does not just does the treatment but helps the child in overcoming the fears and clears all the doubts with patience. Her simple gesture of giving a small take away to a child , washes away all the pains of the treatment.
*** *** *** ** *** **** *********
